name: Mystery Castle: The Mirror's Secret
description: Groth, the Soul Reaver, has kidnapped your daughter Jessica! Explore the dangerous world of the ancient castle and help release the captive souls whom you meet along the way. Can you solve the ingenious traps of the mysterious castle? Defeat Grot's magic and save Jessica!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000, Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: negative, The game was enjoyable to play for the first day or 2 and then I try to open it back up and all it will do is give me fatal errors and close. No help!
